verbose_text: Subjects with a decrease of> = 3 dB in the low-frequency ECoG response after insertion of the CI electrode had a mean hearing loss of 24 dB at 4 weeks after surgery (SD 14 dB, mean presurgical PTA 94 dB HL); subjects with no relevant decrease in the low-frequency ECoG response, a mean hearing loss of 12 dB (SD 9 dB, mean presurgical PTA 92 dB HL).
